subject: Golf
Pregnancy and Obstetrics
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam, one of the most successful female golfers, said on her blog that she was pregnant with her first child. The announcement came three months after Sorenstam, a 38-year-old Swede, competed in her final tournament. sorenstam.
